channel.title: [EzLeech] the server for noobz
channel.description:
well. this project is only because i'm absolutely bored, tbh. probably wont work on it every day im free. when im not working/school, i may do this. may not. but it will be finished.
[size=18pt]about the project:[/size] ezleech is going to be designed as a 'core' server. you will be able to modify everything to your liking outside the core server. the core will be represented as a jar, and all other data needed will be separated into appropriate directories (similar to minecraft)
there will be a control panel which allows access to all of the server settings. a toolkit for modifying data (accounts, packets, quests, etc) though some features will not be added for a long time.
i plan to use rs2hd and will currently only do the 377 revision, however may make higher revision 'cores' later.
data: im more than likely going to support xml&json for data, but for now just xml. i may even get in to adding sqlite or some other data storage. for xml, im considering to not be using native bindings, or xstream. i'm leaning towards jibx.
[size=18pt]current ideas (not implemented anything, still using standard rs2hd #377)[/size] quest (support to define quests) character (support to define new variables to save per player file) command (support to define new commands with specific actions) packet (define packet id and which class to user via the core (for use to change packets if you want) as well as handle packet data such as clicknpc)
[size=18pt]current mockup for the server folder[/size] data/ character/ bank/ vain.xml (stores vain's bank information) inventory/ vain.xml (stores vain's inventory information) save/ vain.xml (stores vain's profile information; including custom defined variables) command/ handler/ item.xml starter.xml tele.xml yell.xml commands.xml (defines the ::TEXT and which handler to use, whether or not to request arguments, and how to handle them for the command) item/ item.xml (item configs) spawn.xml (global item drops if wanted) npc/ npc.xml (npc configs) spawn.xml (npc spawns) packet/ handler/ 14.xml (handles item on player data) 53.xml (handles item on item data) 14.xml (item on player) 53.xml (defines item on item packet) quest/ handler/ 0.xml quests.xml (defines quest ids : quest files) ezleech-core-377.jar
*note* that ^ is all still mockup, and nothing has been started to achieve the packaging/handlers.
[size=18pt]media[/size] http://i.imgur.com/f1gUJnu.jpg http://i.imgur.com/e6uNvBY.jpg http://i.imgur.com/1G6XOi4.jpg http://i.imgur.com/nKowsKz.jpg http://i.imgur.com/7yY73vf.jpg [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=YXH4uxkq18Q]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=YXH4uxkq18Q[/url] http://i.imgur.com/vEHv54C.jpg [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=V-8l_YG7ftk]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=V-8l_YG7ftk[/url] [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=XAbV5z2EPi0]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=XAbV5z2EPi0[/url] [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4x-JL6vqWoQ]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4x-JL6vqWoQ[/url] http://i.imgur.com/NYqB6sK.jpg [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Nvb7Y1Walas]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Nvb7Y1Walas[/url] [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=GQIOENaIm5A]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=GQIOENaIm5A[/url] http://i.imgur.com/L6jLVco.jpg [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=LJy0XJyEH-s]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=LJy0XJyEH-s[/url]
[size=18pt]dev log[/size] aug 5 2013: started the gui aug 6 2013: worked more on gui - added system for launching server, worked more on logging aug 6 2013: created basic toolkit frame ui (currently same as console) aug 9 2013: created basic user profiles for saves/banks. added more view for user data. added bank viewer support aug 10 2013: started on command system (no functionality) fixed a bug, and moved server log aug 15 2013: started setting panel, added basic ui for jlist items.

perhaps i may make toolkits for all the development ‘add quest’ ‘add spawns’(probably going to port off of steven’s one for dementhium) etc etc

but congrats? if you’d like to show yours off, go make your own development thread

item.title: [EzLeech] the server for noobz
item.dc:creator: @Vain1 Vain_
item.description:
@Vain1 wrote:

[quote=“Vain_, post:59, topic:527376”]well i decided to go for a more user-friendly approach on accessing user commands (simplicity is key)

[youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=GQIOENaIm5A[/youtube]
all ‘command’ suggestions will be taken into consideration. so if you have an idea, go ahead and suggest it.[/quote][quote=“Vain_, post:67, topic:527376”]worked on it a bit this week whilst not at work. got the settings tab started, with a few options so far (more settings are available to be suggested!)

also added a nice ui for my lists.
[youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=LJy0XJyEH-s[/youtube]

note, i know the information doesnt update for the ‘Owner’, ‘Administrator’, ‘Moderator’, and ‘Player’ these are because the account saves don’t exist. and therefore it will keep the information on the panel from the last read account. however, the names were only added to show the feature. the coloring for accounts is not final. was just a feature i thought would be nice. (perhaps i could add crowns instead, if that would be more in demand?)

anyway, thank you everyone who has helped with suggestions so far, as well as all the support. this project may be slow, but it’s strong. patience is a virtue![/quote]looking for feedback on both systems

Read full topic
